lines.text: I'll bust your ass the hell out of that uniform, Tylor! You're gonna end up finding a goddamn job washing dishes!
All right. If that's the way you want it, baby.
Baby? I ought to crack you across the mouth.

[Rankin notices Alex Warren's Lincoln Continental driving away]
Hey! Don't I know the driver of that Lincoln?

[to Bubba]
File a report on that draft-dodging, commie son of a bitch.

[chuckles]
Why, his great-grandfather was Robert E. Lee's adversary.
Yeah, well, I'd still like to kick his ass clean from here to Virginia.
Even if we do go to trial, who's going to believe what she says or what I say? A bastard with a badge. That's who they'll believe.
What the hell are you gonna do? Run all your life, like a criminal? Where you gonna go?

[loading his gun]
We're going to Mexico.
